data.description:
Time will melt away as you move your body and explore the globe. Cycle through real world locations, work out with a trainer, surf through city streets, or even test your geography knowledge all while working towards a healthier you. 

We believe that fitness should be fun. So we have designed VZfit to keep you excited and coming back for more.

CHOOSE HOW YOU PLAY

Choose to work out with one of our trainers or turn on some of the great streaming music we offer and get your dance on. Either way, your motion in the real world keeps you moving.

Connect a bike to really kick up your experience. Attach the sensor to the pedal of a stationary bike and off you go! Every ride is now a tour of your favorite destinations, as you visit the snow capped Italian alps or pedal along the sun kissed coast of Oahu.

Looking for something more fast paced? Ring Racer uses our active motion controls to let you race hoverboards through the city streets of the world. Work your way up the leaderboards and unlock banners for your home space.

SO MUCH TO TRY

VZfit is sure to keep you busy with: Challenges- timed events with fun themed character outfits, location guessing game, Pinpoint!, multiplayer, virtual rides, mixed reality, and more. With 10 million miles of road out there, there is something new waiting around every corner.

Ready to ride?

Start your free trial today, or take advantage of our seasonal introductory offer.

changelog.change_log:
--VZfit 3.2--
List view added to the Find Ride map.  In addition to the existing method to search for rides by panning and zooming to spots on a map, you can now toggle on list mode and page through the rides in a list.
You can sort the rides in list view, up or down, by name, length of ride, when you last rode, Ride creation date, and ride progress.
Bug fixes for challenge unlock display
New Challenge assets
Bug fixes for sharing/deleting rides

--3.1.2--
Removed testing code from release code

--3.2.2--
Fixed bugs related to favoriting/sharing/deleting rides
Fixed a crash that could happen when finishing some tutorials
Fixed bug that occurred when continuing an open-ended ride

--3.2.3--
April Fool's Challenge is ready!
Fixed a bug with sharing an open-ended ride after you save it.
UFO sightings now happen every time you ride one of the routes where they are located.

--VZfit 3.2--
List view added to the Find Ride map.  In addition to the existing method to search for rides by panning and zooming to spots on a map, you can now toggle on list mode and page through the rides in a list.
You can sort the rides in list view, up or down, by name, length of ride, when you last rode, Ride creation date, and ride progress.
Bug fixes for challenge unlock display
New Challenge assets
Bug fixes for sharing/deleting rides

--3.1.2--
Removed testing code from release code

--3.2.2--
Fixed bugs related to favoriting/sharing/deleting rides
Fixed a crash that could happen when finishing some tutorials
Fixed bug that occurred when continuing an open-ended ride

--VZfit 3.2--
List view added to the Find Ride map.  In addition to the existing method to search for rides by panning and zooming to spots on a map, you can now toggle on list mode and page through the rides in a list.
You can sort the rides in list view, up or down, by name, length of ride, when you last rode, Ride creation date, and ride progress.
Bug fixes for challenge unlock display
New Challenge assets
Bug fixes for sharing/deleting rides

--3.1.2--
Removed testing code from release code

--VZfit 3.2--
List view added to the Find Ride map.  In addition to the existing method to search for rides by panning and zooming to spots on a map, you can now toggle on list mode and page through the rides in a list.
You can sort the rides in list view, up or down, by name, length of ride, when you last rode, Ride creation date, and ride progress.
Bug fixes for challenge unlock display
New Challenge assets
Bug fixes for sharing/deleting rides

--VZfit 3.1--
New Ring Racer cities added for Athens and Manila!
Assets included for our upcoming Valentine's Day mini-Challenge!
Easier account creation for first time users
Several minor bug fixes

--3.1.1--
Fixed a bug with notification panels that would cause the menu buttons to become unresponsive
Fixed missing race banners on notification of new RingRacer cities

--3.1.2--
Fixed a bug with Challenge map pins showing in the wrong location
Fixed a crash related to an international date/time format conflict
Fixed a crash that would occur occasionally for new users on automatic account creation
Modified the logic for when we label RingRacer cities as "New"

--VZfit 3.1--
New Ring Racer cities added for Athens and Manila!
Assets included for our upcoming Valentine's Day mini-Challenge!
Easier account creation for first time users
Several minor bug fixes

--3.1.1--
Fixed a bug with notification panels that would cause the menu buttons to become unresponsive
Fixed missing race banners on notification of new RingRacer cities

--VZfit 3.1--
New Ring Racer cities added for Athens and Manila!
Assets included for our upcoming Valentine's Day mini-Challenge!
Easier account creation for first time users
Several minor bug fixes

--VZfit 3.0 Is Here!--
--Ring Racer
-New racing gameplay in cities across the world
-Purchase power ups and earn stars to complete cities
-Top the leaderboards
--New Home Space
-Interactive map interface
-Hang your Ring Racer city banners
--Mixed reality gameplay in all modes on Quest 2, 3, and Pro
--Controller-free support - use only your hands to play
--Please note that VZplay games have been moved back to their own standalone app--

--3.0.2--
First patch since 3.0 launch
Many quality of life improvements and fixes since the locked launch build

--3.0.3--
VZplay button is re-enabled to directly launch to it from VZfit
Ring Racer finish line beacon should no longer be showing in other places
When you return to Create Ride you should be in the last location you were
Show host username under multiplayer icons
Show percent of ride complete under Challenge ride icons
Bell has been disabled for hand-tracking mode because it was constantly ringing
Yellow panorama dots have been made smaller
Autosteer path no longer lingers in home space
Minor crash fixes

--3.0.4--
Fixed the No Person / First Person problem
Search by area on map
Hold trigger to switch map joystick control from zoom to pan on either controller
Zoom into cursor location instead of center of map
Fixed the problem where the cursors stop working and you can only ring the bell
"Favorite Rides" instead of "My Ride List"
"Clear Filters" instead of "Show All Rides"
"All Rides" to "Find Rides"

--3.0.5--
Tilt/lean steering sensitivity has been adjusted
Multiplayer icons are now showing accurate information
Added some debugging code to track down the panorama stitching problem on high-res images
Map doesn't change zoom level on multiplayer filter when the live data refreshes
Gaze and controller/hand pointers should no longer be enabled at the same time
Ring Racer riders are no longer showing as joinable on the multiplayer map
GPS map settings no longer apply to home UI map
Resume Ride doesn't get cleared out from playing PinPoint or RingRacer
Create Ride remembers where you were and doesn't start at lat/lon 0,0
Use hover tips to show distances of Short/Medium/Long options on Find Rides filter
App suspend no longer irrevocably mutes the streaming music
PinPoint will no longer show %Infinity for your overall ranking
Exerboard no longer draws over the map during a map pin refresh
Show distance below icons on Find Rides filter
Minimize button on GPS overlay doesn't replace GPS with a white square
Map filters art changes to make it more readable

--3.0.6--
Emergency fix for a persistent startup crash that was affecting some players

--3.0.7--
Home UI space should no longer be rotating occasionally after playing a RingRacer race
Removed likely cause of O/S level crashes

--3.0.8--
Much more promising fix for the high-res panorama tiling problems

--3.0.9--
Assets added for next two Challenges

--3.0.10--
Re-added the $11.99/month with 7-day trial offer

--3.0.11--
ETC2 texture fix for customization assets

--3.0.13--
Lighthouse and water fixes for PCH virtual level
Missing Challenge outfit replaced
Atlas texture problems fixed
Fixed problem with multiplayer filter incorrectly not showing people on unshared rides
Added a callout for the new Challenge
Fixed a problem with one of the subscription purchase buttons

--3.0.14--
Names of other players are being shown again on multiplayer map pins
Multiplayer map filter shows more clear information on left panel
Fixes for multiplayer info in upper right part of map screen
Frame rate improvements associated with an optimized network call

--VZfit 3.0 Is Here!--
--Ring Racer
-New racing gameplay in cities across the world
-Purchase power ups and earn stars to complete cities
-Top the leaderboards
--New Home Space
-Interactive map interface
-Hang your Ring Racer city banners
--Mixed reality gameplay in all modes on Quest 2, 3, and Pro
--Controller-free support - use only your hands to play
--Please note that VZplay games have been moved back to their own standalone app--

--2.3.0.14--
Updated Pin Point rules
Improved Resume Ride functionality
Customization assets for Spring Fling Challenge
Safeguards for collecting Coins

--Hotfix Notes--
Fixed frame rate problems in Coastal Highway - Day/Night
Tutorial rides no longer appear in the multiplayer list
Can no longer advance past screens while splash video is playing
Farplane fix for City Mode rendering
Crash fix for some City Mode sessions
Unity upgrade to try and fix particle system crashes
Customization assets for next Challenge
Minor crash fixes

--2.3.3.1--
Starting with Quest Firmware v55

--2.3.4.1--
Adapted to new Bluetooth methods for Android 12

--2.3.5.0--
Gothic Halloween challenge assets added

--2.3.6.0--
Assets added for next two Challenges

Bell has been disabled for hand-tracking mode because it was constantly ringing
Yellow panorama dots have been made smaller
Autosteer path no longer lingers in home space
Minor crash fixes

--3.0.4--
Fixed the No Person / First Person problem
Search by area on map
Hold trigger to switch map joystick control from zoom to pan on either controller
Zoom into cursor location instead of center of map
Fixed the problem where the cursors stop working and you can only ring the bell
"Favorite Rides" instead of "My Ride List"
"Clear Filters" instead of "Show All Rides"
"All Rides" to "Find Rides"

--3.0.5--
Tilt/lean steering sensitivity has been adjusted
Multiplayer icons are now showing accurate information
Added some debugging code to track down the panorama stitching problem on high-res images
Map doesn't change zoom level on multiplayer filter when the live data refreshes
Gaze and controller/hand pointers should no longer be enabled at the same time
Ring Racer riders are no longer showing as joinable on the multiplayer map
GPS map settings no longer apply to home UI map
Resume Ride doesn't get cleared out from playing PinPoint or RingRacer
Create Ride remembers where you were and doesn't start at lat/lon 0,0
Use hover tips to show distances of Short/Medium/Long options on Find Rides filter
App suspend no longer irrevocably mutes the streaming music
PinPoint will no longer show %Infinity for your overall ranking
Exerboard no longer draws over the map during a map pin refresh
Show distance below icons on Find Rides filter
Minimize button on GPS overlay doesn't replace GPS with a white square
Map filters art changes to make it more readable

--3.0.6--
Emergency fix for a persistent startup crash that was affecting some players

--3.0.7--
Home UI space should no longer be rotating occasionally after playing a RingRacer race
